Package GokbeysfurnitureCompany

Class Administrator

  • java.lang.Object
    • GokbeysfurnitureCompany.User
      • GokbeysfurnitureCompany.Administrator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<User>
    public class Administrator
extends User
    Administrator class for the Furniture Company. Extends abstract class Person. Implements Admin interface. All methods except the ones inherited from Person superclass because all admins can access all branches,employees etc.

      • query

        public static CompanyContainer<Product> query​(Branch b)
        Queries a branch for needs.
        Parameters:
        b - Branch which will be queried.
        Returns:
        Needed (low on amount) products. null if there is no need to any Product in the specified branch.

      • createProduct

        public static void createProduct​(int branchID,
                                 int productId,
                                 java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String color)
                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                 java.util.NoSuchElementException
        Create a new Product on specified branch.
        Parameters:
        branchID - ID of the Branch.
        productId - ID of the new Product.
        name - Name of the product.
        color - Color of the product.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the given product already exists.
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - when there is no branch with the given ID.

      • addProduct

        public static void addProduct​(int branchID,
                              int productId,
                              int amount)
                       throws java.util.NoSuchElementException,
                              java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Add a product (usually used with query function to supply needed products).
        Parameters:
        branchID - ID of the Branch.
        productId - ID of the Product.
        amount - Amount of the Product to be shipped to the specified Branch.
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - When there is no branch or product with the given ID's.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given amount is less then 1.
